overview:
Claudia has produced numerous events for ContentNext Media, the company operating paidContent.org, mocoNews.net, contentSutra.com and paidContent:UK. She has overseen the planning of many industry events including ContentNext’s signature networking mixers, half-day seminars, and the annual EconSM: Economics of Social Media Conference.

Claudia is an event logistics consultant providing full-service event production and assisting with all aspects of special event, meeting, and conference planning. Her services include project management and on-site supervision of conferences, seminars, exhibits, receptions and special events.

Claudia also consults for large organizations including The National Association of Television Program Executives, a global organization which sponsors a three-day annual conference that draws attendees from more than 70 countries worldwide.

As a member of the Green Meetings Industry Council, she is committed to minimizing the environmental impact of the events she is involved with.
